questions.question: 1.In the slope deflection method, what type of behavior is assumed for materials?

explanations.d: In the slope deflection method elastic behavior is assumed for materials

questions.question: 2. Which of the following structures is best suited for the application of the slope deflection method?

explanations.c: Multistory building frame is best suited for the application of the slope deflection method

questions.question: 3. A two step solution process is needed for  _______ .
4. A single bay, single story frame under horizontal loads only is a _______.
5. In the slope deflection method, equilibrium equations at joints are used to_______ .

answers.c: Ensure that forces and moments are in balance

explanations.c: In the slope deflection method, equilibrium equations at joints are used to ensure that forces and moments are in balance
